panel.label: General
panel.name: land_general_panel
panel.panel.string: You must approve your purchase to modify this land.
No parcel selected. Go to World menu > About Land or select another parcel to show its details.

check_box.label: Allow Deed to Group
check_box.name: check deed
check_box.tool_tip: A group officer can deed this land to the group, so it will be supported by the group's land allocation.

button.label: Deed...
button.name: Deed...
button.tool_tip: You may only deed land if you are an officer in the selected group.

check_box.label: Owner Makes Contribution With Deed
check_box.name: check contrib
check_box.tool_tip: When the land is deeded to the group, the former owner contributes enough land allocation to support it.

text.name: Sell with landowners objects in parcel.
Selling with no objects in parcel.

button.label: Buy Pass...
button.name: Buy Pass...
button.tool_tip: A pass gives you temporary access to this land.

button.label: Linden Sale...
button.name: Linden Sale...
button.tool_tip: Land must be owned, set content, and not already for auction.

panel.label: Covenant
panel.name: land_covenant_panel
panel.panel.string: Purchased land in this region may be resold.
Purchased land in this region may not be resold.
Purchased land in this region may be joined or subdivided.
Purchased land in this region may not be joined or subdivided.
panel.text_editor: There is no Covenant provided for this Estate.
panel.text: Land in this region may not be resold.
Land in this region may not be joined/subdivided.

panel.label: Objects
panel.name: land_objects_panel
panel.text: Autoreturn other residents' objects (minutes, 0 for off):

panel.label: Options
panel.name: land_options_panel
panel.panel.string: Let people see this parcel in search results
This option is disabled because this parcel's area is 128 m² or smaller. Only large parcels can be listed in search.
This option is disabled because you cannot modify this parcel's options.
Your parcel information or content is considered mature.
Your parcel information or content is considered adult.

check_box.label: Edit Terrain
check_box.name: edit land check
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, anyone can terraform your land. It is best to leave this unchecked, as you can always edit your own land.

check_box.label: Fly
check_box.name: check fly
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, Residents can fly on your land. If unchecked, they can only fly into and over your land.

check_box.label: Safe (no damage)
check_box.name: check safe
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, sets the land to Safe, disabling damage combat. If cleared, damage combat is enabled.

check_box.label: No Pushing
check_box.name: PushRestrictCheck
check_box.tool_tip: Prevents scripts from pushing. Checking this option may be useful for preventing disruptive behavior on your land.

check_box.label: Show Place in Search (L$30/week) under
check_box.name: ShowDirectoryCheck
check_box.tool_tip: Let people see this parcel in search results

button.label: Set
button.name: Set
button.tool_tip: Sets the landing point where visitors arrive. Sets to your avatar's location inside this parcel.

combo_box.name: landing type
combo_box.tool_tip: Teleport Routing -- select how to handle teleports onto your land

panel.label: Media
panel.name: land_media_panel

combo_box.name: media type
combo_box.tool_tip: Specify if the URL is a movie, web page, or other media

check_box.label: Hide URL
check_box.name: hide_media_url
check_box.tool_tip: Checking this option will hide the media url to any non-authorized viewers of this parcel information. Note this is not available for HTML types.

line_editor.name: url_description
line_editor.tool_tip: Text displayed next to play/load button

panel.text:
Objects using this texture will show the movie or web page after you click the play arrow.
Select the thumbnail to choose a different texture.

check_box.label: Auto scale
check_box.name: media_auto_scale
check_box.tool_tip: Checking this option will scale the content for this parcel automatically. It may be slightly slower and lower quality visually but no other texture scaling or alignment will be required.

text.name: media_size
text.tool_tip: Size to render Web media, leave 0 for default.

spinner.name: media_size_width
spinner.tool_tip: Size to render Web media, leave 0 for default.

spinner.name: media_size_height
spinner.tool_tip: Size to render Web media, leave 0 for default.

check_box.label: Loop
check_box.name: media_loop
check_box.tool_tip: Play media in a loop. When the media has finished playing, it will restart from the beginning.

check_box.label: Restrict gesture and object sounds to this parcel
check_box.name: check sound local

panel.label: Access
panel.name: land_access_panel
panel.panel.string: One or more of these options is set at the estate level

text.name: Limit access to this parcel to:

check_box.label: Residents who have not given payment info to Linden Lab
check_box.name: limit_payment

check_box.label: Residents who are not age verified adults
check_box.name: limit_age_verified
check_box.tool_tip: Ban residents who have not verified their age. See the [SUPPORT_SITE] for more information.

check_box.label: Allow Group Access: [GROUP]
check_box.name: GroupCheck
check_box.tool_tip: Set group in the General tab.

check_box.label: Sell passes to:
check_box.name: PassCheck
check_box.tool_tip: Allows temporary access to this parcel
